feed.title: Less is better: Another stop on the RubyCLR World Tour
feed.subtitle: John Lam on software

entry.title: Another stop on the RubyCLR World Tour
entry.summary: I’ll be giving a keynote on the Future of Programming Languages at VS Live! in Toronto on April 26. I’ve been spending a lot of time thinking about why dynamic languages are important, so this is a story that I can’t not tell. While this keynote isn’t just about RubyCLR, you can bet that it will play a major role in the story :)
entry.content: I’ll be giving a keynote on the Future of Programming Languages at VS Live! in Toronto on April 26. I’ve been spending a lot of time thinking about why dynamic languages are important, so this is a story that I can’t not tell. While this keynote isn’t just about RubyCLR, you can bet that it will play a major role in the story :)
